title: The Treasure In My Trash
features: Rather you're in need of a reason to keep pushing, or just want to be reminded just how thankful you are to not face as much calamity and setbacks as often as others "THE TREASURE IN MY TRASH" is a must read.There is nothing better than a really good book that will have you laughing in one chapter, sad in the next chapter and saying " OH NO" out loud as you flip through the chapters. This autobiography will have you a bit puzzled at the fact that it isn't fiction, but a very dramatic entertaining heartfelt story of a very strong young lady who endured it all. "THE TREASURE IN MY TRASH" is an amazing story of happiness, pain, property, confusion, faith, abuse and mistakes. A good, bad, ugly and beautiful life story of how you can be singing happy tunes loud enough for heaven to hear one moment and facing a life and death situation the next. Everyone has a story to tell, and this autobiography is a must tell, must read type of story. A story that one should be very proud to be able to say " I OVERCAME IT ALL". This autobiography is exactly that and some. It's to teach some to keep pushing, regardless whats pushing back, to show others that they are to be grateful to not have such storms and to simply just enlighten some, causing their hearts to soften, eyes to water or souls to laugh out loud.This autobiography "THE TREASURE IN MY TRASH" is exactly that, a treasure, in the midst of all kings of trash.
description: Chasity Velasquez decided to share her story to help others one day share their story. Whether it's in the form of a book, poem, play, song etc. She believes that we can become indestructible individuals and as a world, by teaching, learning and hearing how others have endured and vanquish their life storms. Chasity Velasquez has accepted and embraced every season, every day and every moment of her life, now understanding that it's all things working together that cause us to flourish and reach your divine destiny. Her ambition is to help those who read her autobiography to have no shame about the things that are unfolding in their lives but instead to keep pursuing their dreams and smiling, in fearless faith. Chasity Velasquez is not only the author of
, but she also engages in poetry, inspiring and positive quotes and blogging on social media as

. She currently resides in Kingwood, Texas, which is a small town close to her hometown Houston, Texas with her son and husband at this time. So please stay tune for more writing projects and poetry by Chasity Velasquez, in the near future.
